constant to indicate the Photographer to some routines

preferred height of accessory panel
PREFERRED_WIDTH - Static variable in class jpo.PictureAdder
preferred width of accessory panel
PictureAdder - class jpo.PictureAdder.
Brings up a Filechooser and then loads the selected pictures into the collection.
PictureAdder(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureAdder
Constructor for a PictureAdder.
PictureCache - class jpo.PictureCache.
class that manages the cache of pictures
PictureCache() - Constructor for class jpo.PictureCache
 
PictureCacheLoader - class jpo.PictureCacheLoader.
This is a class that is non static that can load imaged to the cache
PictureCacheLoader(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureCacheLoader
Create a PictureCacheLoader for the node supplied
PictureCacheLoader(URL, double) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureCacheLoader
Create a PictureCacheLoader and supply the URL to be loaded.
PictureInfo - class jpo.PictureInfo.
Objects of this type represent a single picture in the collection.

Constructor method.
PictureInfo(URL, String, String, String) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureInfo
Constructor method.
PictureInfo() - Constructor for class jpo.PictureInfo

PictureInfoChangeEvent - class jpo.PictureInfoChangeEvent.
Objects of this class have details about what was changed in a PictureInfo object.
PictureInfoChangeEvent(PictureInfo) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureInfoChangeEvent
Constructor for the PictureInforChangeEvent
PictureInfoChangeListener - interface jpo.PictureInfoChangeListener.
This interface allows PictureInfo objects to tell other objects about changes
PictureInfoEditor - class jpo.PictureInfoEditor.
class that creates a JFrame and displays the fields of a picture.
PictureInfoEditor(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.PictureInfoEditor
Constructor that creates the JFrame and objects.
PicturePane - class jpo.PicturePane.
The job of this extended JComponent is to load, scale and display a picture while providing mouse control over which area is being shown and at which magnification.
PicturePane() - Constructor for class jpo.PicturePane
Constructor
PicturePane.Listener - class jpo.PicturePane.Listener.
class that deals with the mouse events.
PicturePane.Listener() - Constructor for class jpo.PicturePane.Listener
 
PicturePopupMenu - class jpo.PicturePopupMenu.
This class generates a popup menu over a picture node.
PicturePopupMenu(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode) - Constructor for class jpo.PicturePopupMenu
Constructs a popupmenu for the indicated picture node.
PictureViewer - class jpo.PictureViewer.
PictureViewer manages a window which diplays a picture.
PictureViewer() - Constructor for class jpo.PictureViewer
Brings up a window in which a picture node is displayed.
ProgressGui - class jpo.ProgressGui.
a private class that allows the PictureAdder to show what it is doing.

putCheckFlush(String) - Method in class jpo.HtmlDistillerThread.DescriptionsBuffer
Adds the supplied string to the buffer and performs a check whether the buffer is full If the buffer is full it flushes it.
